properties.name: term
properties.description: The dictionary term which needs to be added to dictionary feedback system

properties.name: dialect
properties.description: The dialect for the given term, dialect format is {language}-{country} where language follows ISO 639-1 standard and country follows ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard

properties.name: boostValue
properties.description: A weighted value assigned to a phrase. The higher the value, the higher the likelihood that the system will choose the word or phrase from the possible alternatives. Boost range is from 1.0 to 10.0. Default is 2.0

properties.name: source
properties.description: The source of the given dictionary feedback

properties.name: examplePhrases
properties.description: A list of at least 3 and up to 20 unique phrases that are example usage of the term

properties.name: phrase
properties.description: The Example Phrase text. At least 3 words and up to 20 words

properties.name: source
properties.description: The source of the given Example Phrase

properties.name: soundsLike
properties.description: A list of up to 10 terms that give examples of how the term sounds
